# eui-row

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                            | Type               | Default                                                                                  |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `breakpoints`    | --                | sets the breakpoint for window widths                                  | `Breakpoints`      | `{     xs: 480,     sm: 576,     md: 768,     lg: 992,     xl: 1200,     xxl: 1600,   }` |
| `gutter`         | `gutter`          | amount of space between cols horizontally                              | `Gutter \| number` | `12`                                                                                     |
| `spans`          | `spans`           | sets the max amount of spans that are to be displayed in the component | `number`           | `12`                                                                                     |
| `verticalGutter` | `vertical-gutter` | amount of space between cols vertically                                | `Gutter \| number` | `12`                                                                                     |
